author: Kimmy Yam
title: Black, Asian and Hispanic House caucus chairs unite in 'no tolerance' for coronavirus racism
description: The leaders of the congressional black, Asian and Hispanic caucuses, joined by other Democratic leaders, called for unity against attacks on Asian Americans in association with the coronavirus.
content:
The leaders of the congressional black, Asian and Hispanic caucuses gathered Monday to condemn the racism that the Asian American community is confronting during the COVID-19 pandemic.
The chairs of all three caucuses, as well as leaders of the full Democrat… [+4310 chars]
